title: Self-Transformation and Identity Formation in University Liberal Education: Interdisciplinary Instructional Modules Based on a Multi-Component Algorithm

context.prior_knowledge: Leadership and management experience, basic humanities literacy, and understanding of interdisciplinary approaches
context.additional_context: Learning environment where most learners serve as social leaders, enabling interaction among learners from diverse cultural backgrounds. Activities can be supported by digital devices

learning_goals: Learners understand the formation of cultural identity in liberal education and can apply this understanding to personal life planning.
Learners can systematically analyze self-transformation and identity formation processes through interdisciplinary modules based on multi-component algorithms.
Learners can consciously select diverse values and develop strategies to enhance interaction skills in multicultural environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
